QuestData.Title: The Slithering Darkness
QuestData.Description: The vile jormungar have taken over most of the Hibernal Cavern. They are despicable beings... children of Loken, Thorim's scumsucker of a brother.$B$BAs Thorim's servants we owe it to ourselves to kill these scum where we find them. You'll find the cavern just east of here, outside the village.
QuestData.LogDescription: Astrid Bjornrittar wants you to slay 8 Ravenous Jormungar in the Hibernal Cavern east of Brunnhildar Village.
QuestData.RewardText: The jormungar are vile creatures. You did well in destroying them.
